txt.en: You have been tasked with thwarting a group of Dourhand treasure hunters at High Sundergrót.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from High Sundergrót. The old ruins run amok with Dourhands! Those dwarves have no sense of honour and will cause nothing but trouble. We must put a stop to their treasure seeking efforts.

'If the Dourhands have nowhere to seek treasure, then perhaps they will leave these mountains for good!'
Dourhands have found High Sundergrót and seek what treasures they can find from the old dwarf ruins….\n\nYour mission is to thwart a group of Dourhand treasure hunters at High Sundergrót.
Some monsters in this mission will attempt to lay down traps that will give you a debuff if caught in the trap.
Your mission is to thwart a group of Dourhand treasure hunters at High Sundergrót.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to High Sundergrót.

'Well done! With those Dourhands defeated, High Sundergrót is once again safe. Perhaps it is time to plead for more dwarves to guard the old ruins, for High Sundergrót is a place rich in dwarf-history and must be protected.'
